page.title: 18EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES
page.content: Before the age of{5 years}local children have the opportunity of attending one of{two play groups}which are run largely on a{voluntary}basis. {State controlled education}begins at the age of 5 years when children begin their{primary schooling. There are{two primary schools}in Burtonwood. The{Roman Catholic school {St.Paul of the Cross}and our school {Burtonwood County Primary.}About{95 children attend St.Paul's and{236 children attend here. At the age of{11 years}children have to be{'bused'}out of the area for their{secondary education.}Most children go to{Sankey High School}run by{Cheshire Education Authority.}The alternative is{Selwyn Jones}in Newton- le-Willows run by{Merseyside Education {Authority.}Most{Roman Catholic children go to{St. Aeldred's school.
